Data.text_description:
The probability of temperature outside being hot (A=1) is 0.5024. 
For those with temperature outside being cold (A=0), the probability of number of people wearing winter coats being many (B=1) is 0.4487. 
For those with temperature outside being hot (A=1), the probability of number of people wearing winter coats being many (B=1) is 0.2622. 
For those with number of people wearing winter coats being few (B=0), the probability of likelihood of snowfall being likely (C=1) is 0.8720. 
For those with number of people wearing winter coats being many (B=1), the probability of likelihood of snowfall being likely (C=1) is 0.9537. 
For those with number of people wearing winter coats being few (B=0), the probability of amount of snow accumulation being excessive (D=1) is 0.5885. 
For those with number of people wearing winter coats being many (B=1), the probability of amount of snow accumulation being excessive (D=1) is 0.9559.

Background.data_info: 在穿冬大衣的人数为多(B=1)的条件下, 积雪量为过多(D=1)的概率为0.9533。穿冬大衣的人数为少(B=0)且积雪量为最少(D=0)的概率为0.2692。穿冬大衣的人数为多(B=1)且积雪量为过多(D=1)的概率为0.3365。

Questions.Instruction: 考虑穿冬大衣的人数作用于积雪量的充分性概率(probability of sufficiency, PS)。
Questions.Question: 给定穿冬大衣的人数为少且积雪量为最少, 假如穿冬大衣的人数为多，此时积雪量为过多的概率的上界是多少？
